string.name: tween
string.tiptext: Starts a movieclip tweening animation
string.text: .tween(%property, desired property value [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: stopTween
string.tiptext: Stops tweens being done
string.text: .stopTween(%property[, property, ...]%);\n

string.name: alphaTo
string.tiptext: Fades a movieclip to a given opacity value
string.text: .alphaTo(%alpha [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: bezierSlideTo
string.tiptext: Slides a movieclip to a given position using a bezier curve
string.text: .bezierSlideTo(%control point x, control point y, x, y [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: colorTo
string.tiptext: Do a color (tint) transformation on a movieclip to a given color
string.text: .colorTo(%color [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: colorTransformTo
string.tiptext: Do a color (advanced) transformation on a movieclip to a given color
string.text: .colorTransformTo(%ra, rb, ga, gb, ba, bb, aa, ab [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n
string.text2: .colorTransformTo(%colorTransformObject [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: frameTo
string.tiptext: Moves to a frame on the timeline using equations
string.text: .frameTo(%frame [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: resizeTo
string.tiptext: Resizes a movieclip to a given width and height
string.text: .resizeTo(%width, height, [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: rotateTo
string.tiptext: Rotates a movieclip to a given degree
string.text: .rotateTo(%scale [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: roundedBezierSlideTo
string.tiptext: Slides a movieclip to a given position using a bezier curve, using only rounded positions
string.text: .roundedBezierSlideTo(%control point x, control point y, x, y [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: roundedSlideTo
string.tiptext: Slides a movieclip to a given position, using only rounded positions
string.text: .roundedSlideTo(%x, y [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: roundedTween
string.tiptext: Starts a movieclip tweening animation, using only rounded numbers
string.text: .roundedTween(%property, desired property value [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: roundedXSlideTo
string.tiptext: Slides a movieclip to a given horizontal position, using only rounded positions
string.text: .roundedXSlideTo(%x [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: roundedYSlideTo
string.tiptext: Slides a movieclip to a given vertical position, using only rounded positions
string.text: .roundedYSlideTo(%y [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: scaleTo
string.tiptext: Scales a movieclip to a given percentage
string.text: .scaleTo(%scale [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: slideTo
string.tiptext: Slides a movieclip to a given position
string.text: .slideTo(%x, y [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: xScaleTo
string.tiptext: Scales a movieclip horizontally to a given percentage
string.text: .xScaleTo(%scale [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: xSlideTo
string.tiptext: Slides a movieclip to a given horizontal position
string.text: .xSlideTo(%x [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: yScaleTo
string.tiptext: Scales a movieclip vertically to a given percentage
string.text: .yScaleTo(%scale [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: ySlideTo
string.tiptext: Slides a movieclip to a given vertical position
string.text: .ySlideTo(%y [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: blurTo
string.tiptext: Adds a Blur filter to a movieclip
string.text: .blurTo(%blurFilter [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n
string.text2: .blurTo(%blurXY [, quality 1-3, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: xyBlurTo
string.tiptext: Adds a Blur filter to a movieclip with different horizontal and vertical values
string.text: .xyBlurTo(%blurX, blurY [, quality 1-3, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: xBlurTo
string.tiptext: Adds a horizontal Blur filter to a movieclip
string.text: .xBlurTo(%blurX [, quality 1-3, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: yBlurTo
string.tiptext: Adds a vertical Blur filter to a movieclip
string.text: .yBlurTo(%blurY [, quality 1-3, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: glowTo
string.tiptext: Adds a Glow filter to a movieclip
string.text: .glowTo(%glowFilter [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n
string.text2: .glowTo(%[color, alpha 0-1, blurXY, strength 0-1, quality 1-3, inner, knockout, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: xyGlowTo
string.tiptext: Adds a Glow filter to a movieclip with different horizontal and vertical blur values
string.text: .xyGlowTo(%[color, alpha 0-1, blurX, blurY, strength 0-1, quality 1-3, inner, knockout, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: xGlowTo
string.tiptext: Adds a horizontal Glow filter to a movieclip
string.text: .xGlowTo(%[color, alpha 0-1, blurX, strength 0-1, quality 1-3, inner, knockout, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: yGlowTo
string.tiptext: Adds a horizontal Glow filter to a movieclip
string.text: .yGlowTo(%[color, alpha 0-1, blurY, strength 0-1, quality 1-3, inner, knockout, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: bevelTo
string.tiptext: Adds a Bevel filter to a movieclip
string.text: .bevelTo(%BevelFilter [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n
string.text2: .bevelTo(%[distance, angle, highlightColor, highlightAlpha 0-1, shadowColor, shadowAlpha 0-1, blurXY, strength 0-1, quality 1-3, type, knockout, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: xyBevelTo
string.tiptext: Adds a Bevel filter to a movieclip with different horizontal and vertical blur values
string.text: .bevelTo(%[distance, angle, highlightColor, highlightAlpha 0-1, shadowColor, shadowAlpha 0-1, blurX, blurY, strength 0-1, quality 1-3, type, knockout, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: lockTween
string.tiptext: Locks a movieclip, so it can't be tweened anymore

string.name: unlockTween
string.tiptext: Unlocks a movieclip (locked by .lockTween()), so it can be tweened again

string.name: pauseTween
string.tiptext: Pauses one or more tweenings
string.text: .pauseTween(%property[, property, ...]%);\n

string.name: resumeTween
string.tiptext: resumes one or more tweenings that have been paused
string.text: .resumes(%property[, property, ...]%);\n

string.name: isTweening
string.tiptext: Returns true if a tweening is active for this movieclip, false if otherwise

string.name: getTweens
string.tiptext: Returns the number of tweens being done for this movieclip

string.name: onTweenUpdate
string.tiptext: Invoked after there is an update on a property being tweened on this movieclip

string.name: onTweenComplete
string.tiptext: Invoked after an specific property tween has been completed for this movieclip

string.name: stopTween
string.tiptext: Stops tweens being done
string.text: .stopTween(%property[, property, ...]%);\n

string.name: panTo
string.tiptext: Starts a sound panning tweening
string.text: .panTo(%pan [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: volumeTo
string.tiptext: Starts a sound volume fade
string.text: .volumeTo(%volume [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n

string.name: lockTween
string.tiptext: Locks a sound, so it can't be tweened anymore

string.name: unlockTween
string.tiptext: Unlocks a sound (locked by .lockTween()), so it can be tweened again

string.name: pauseTween
string.tiptext: Pauses one or more tweenings
string.text: .pauseTween(%property[, property, ...]%);\n

string.name: resumeTween
string.tiptext: resumes one or more tweenings that have been paused
string.text: .resumes(%property[, property, ...]%);\n

string.name: isTweening
string.tiptext: Returns true if a tweening is active for this sound, false if otherwise

string.name: getTweens
string.tiptext: Returns the number of tweens being done for this sound

string.name: onTweenUpdate
string.tiptext: Invoked after there is an update on a property being tweened on this sound

string.name: onTweenComplete
string.tiptext: Invoked after an specific property tween has been completed for this sound

string.name: tween

string.text: .tween(%property, desired property value [, seconds to complete, animation type, delay to start, callback function, amplitude for elastic easing, period for elastic easing]%);\n
